Project description

Recurly

This repository houses the official python library for Recurly's V3 API.

Note:If you were looking for the V2 client, see the v2 branch.

Documentation

This library's python documentation is hosted on ReadTheDocs.It contains the Getting Started guide as well as the reference documentation.

Documentation for the HTTP API and example code can be foundon our Developer Portal.

Contributing

Please see our Contributing Guide.
